髶字的基本解释

髶
èr
（头发）散乱：“髶髦被绣。”

髶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［róng］
［《廣韻》而容切，平鍾，日。］
［《廣韻》而至切，去至，日。］
乱发。

髶字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【髟字部】　髶； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1453第43
【廣韻】如容切【集韻】而容切，?音茸。【說文】亂髮也。【張衡·東京賦】髶髦被繡。【註】髶髦，髦頭茸騎也。【類篇】或作?。　又【廣韻】而至切【集韻】【韻會】仍吏切，?音二。去髮飾。

髶字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
髶字的起名意思

暂无。

髶
èr
(Hair) is scattered: "The bangs are embroidered."

[①]［róng］
["Guangyun" and Rongqie, Pingzhong, Day. ]
["Guangyun" and to cut, go to, day. ]
Messy hair.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji Chapter 1】【Yunzi Department】　髶; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1453 Page 43
[Guang Yun] Such as Rongqie [Jiyun] and Rongqie,? Yinrong. [Said the text] Random hair too. 【Zhang Heng·Tokyo Fu】The curb is embroidered. 【Note】Fashionable hair, velvet hairy riding. 【Classes】Or for?.　[Guangyun] and even cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] still cut,? Sound two. Go to hair accessories.
